data.app_name: Jake and Tess' Finding Monsters Adventure
data.description:
"Finding Monsters is a stunning game with adorable monsters and an original premise and play style.” (VRGiant)
 
“Jake and Tess’ Finding Monsters Adventure is one of the best looking Gear VR titles VRFocus has yet witnessed.” (VRFocus)

Finding Monsters Adventure has some awesome news for you: Now the game costs only $4.99 and we support 8 new languages: Chinese (Simplified), Korean, German, French, Italian, Japanese, Russian and Spanish. Not enough? You asked and we heard: you can also take pictures with your gamepad thanks to our partial controller support enabled in this new version.

Finding Monsters Adventure on Gear VR is a fantastic photo challenge that continues the magical universe of Jake & Tess as they dare each other to take pictures of the funny, cute & mischievous monsters in this immersive experience.

Get your Gear VR ready as this unique family experience that takes monster hunting to the next level.

changelog.change_log:
•  Price drop: from $7.99 to $4.99.
•  New languages: Chinese (Simplified), Korean, German, French, Italian, Japanese, Russian and Spanish.
•  Partial gamepad support.
•  General bugfixes.

•  Back button fix according with oculus guidelines
•  Now you can get whoopsie plush
•  Dare list and whoopsie seal dont appear on photo
•  Reset data fix
•  Back from oculus home was causing animation problems on portals (fixed)
•  Notification poster working correct 
•  Font update to avoid missing letters
•  Dare List Fixes
•  Balance Improvements

Fixes: Now you can get whoopsie plush / Dare list and whoopsie seal dont appear on photo / Reset data fix / Back from oculus home was causing animation problems on portals (fixed) / Notification poster working correct / Font update to avoid missing letters

- Back button go to Oculus Home with confirmation
- Remove crosshair when you grab a plush
- Dare list fix and updates
- Improvement on Moonland performance
- Animations transition smoother
- Swipe/Tap control improvement

Updates
- Change promotion images
- Update audio on bedroom
- Loading Improvement (Not 100% yet)
- Dare List update
- Iceland Optimization
- Start Moon Optimization
- Fix some UI fx
- Gameplay Balance
- New shaders configurations

Know Issues
- Loading need a final polish 
- Couple of Dares don't working
- Last general polish
